content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Aziz Trabelsi from Tunesia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Aziz Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: Hello Aziz Trabelsi, it's a pleasure to meet you. Thank you for your interest in my apartment. I understand that you're looking for a specific rental price. Can you please provide me with a range that you're willing to pay?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I am looking for the lowest price possible. Can you give me your final offer?
name: Aziz Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: Certainly, Aziz. I am willing to consider a rental price of €500 per month. This includes the use of the entire 25 square meter apartment, and all utilities will be included in the monthly rent. Is this a price that you are willing to accept?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I agree to the price of €500 per month. Thank you for your generosity.

Please provide me with the lease agreement.

Can you give me your contact information in case I need to contact you in the future?
name: Aziz Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: Of course, Aziz. I will prepare the lease agreement for you to review and sign. As for my contact information, feel free to reach out to me at [insert your contact information here]. Please let me know if you have any questions or concerns before signing the lease.
name: Heinrich Heine
